original_title: Чужая жена и муж под кроватью
overview: Based on the early stories of Fyodor Dostoevsky. A jealous husband is trying to track down his wife, whom he suspects of cheating. He is persistent and purposeful — it seems that a little more, and the cheat will be brought to light! But men will never surpass women's cunning and resourcefulness.
title: Another Man's Wife and Husband Under Bed
